About.Title: About me
About.Description: My name is Lazizbek. I am the Middle Frontend Developer based on Uzbekistan. I have been coding since 2020 and I specialize in many fields. I am a student of the Central Asian University and studying in the Computer Science. My tech stack is: Next.js, React.js. I am coding in the Typescript language. Moreover I am learning the Machine Learning, and i know different stuff from it

Skills.Description: Clean Code, Reliable Architechture, Pattern Programming
